trends: There have been 12 other sightings in Mesquite
There were no other sightings in Mesquite on or around February 15th 2009
divs: Sighting DetailsLooking out front door southerly direction. observed bite fire ball white hot with magenta core. Long tail very fast east to south plummet. No sound. Broken segmented contrail formed few seconds afterward. Disappeared over roof tops.
